creator: mike.morris@coco-technologies.co.za
text:
While setting up a vhosting setup, in error missed out on linking a host's
appBase to the real directory.  An error/misconfiguration of this magnitude
should at least get logged, but is, instead, silently ignored.

Please log missing appBase as at least CONFIG or WARNING.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: Sorry, there's no DTD and little validation. This will not be addressed for now.
